typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Año} as string,
		Marca as string,
		{Total del producto} as string,
		{Cantidad de productos} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> saBRANDORDERS
source(output(
		{Año} as string,
		Marca as string,
		{Total del producto} as decimal(15,2),
		{Cantidad de productos} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dboBRANDORDERS
Columnaderivada2, dboBRANDORDERS join(saBRANDORDERS@{Año} == dboBRANDORDERS@{Año}
	&& saBRANDORDERS@Marca == dboBRANDORDERS@Marca,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Combinacion1
Combinacion1 alterRow(updateIf(equals(saBRANDORDERS@{Año},dboBRANDORDERS@{Año}) && equals(saBRANDORDERS@Marca,dboBRANDORDERS@Marca)
&&(notEquals(saBRANDORDERS@{Total del producto},dboBRANDORDERS@{Total del producto})
    ||notEquals(saBRANDORDERS@{Cantidad de productos},dboBRANDORDERS@{Total del producto}))),
	upsertIf(!isNull(saBRANDORDERS@{Año})&&!isNull(saBRANDORDERS@Marca)&&isNull(dboBRANDORDERS@{Año})&&isNull(dboBRANDORDERS@Marca)),
	deleteIf(isNull(saBRANDORDERS@{Año})&&isNull(saBRANDORDERS@Marca)&&!isNull(dboBRANDORDERS@{Año})&&!isNull(dboBRANDORDERS@Marca))) ~> Modificarfila1
Modificarfila1 filter(isUpsert() || isUpdate() || isDelete()) ~> Filtrar1
Filtrar1 derive() ~> Columnaderivada1
saBRANDORDERS derive({Total del producto} = toDecimal({Total del producto}, 15, 2)) ~> Columnaderivada2
Columnaderivada1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Año} as string,
		Marca as string,
		{Total del producto} as decimal(15,2),
		{Cantidad de productos} as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkBRANDORDERS
